Paste your secret in the text box. Creat: Paste your secret in the text box. Create a link to your secret, the secret will be encrypted. Send the link to the recipient. The recipient can access the secret within 100 days by this link. After the link has been accessed, the encrypted secret will be deleted. Following accesses will lead to an error message.
Sending secrets by email has some proble: Sending secrets by email has some problems. First, the email is sent in clear text, everybody who can read the transmission can read the secret, second the email is stored in the email account of the sender and the recipient! read2burn.com enables a secure transmission by storing the secret encrypted and creating an access url that is valid only once. Therefore a manipulation by others will be recognized.
Never encrypt login and password togethe: Never encrypt login and password together.
Send login and password always separatel: Send login and password always separately.
All transactions are made encrypted. The: All transactions are made encrypted. The secret is stored encrypted. The key will not be stored. There is no log, no database, no way to decrypt the secret without the URL.
Text available only once by this URL:: The text is only available once on this URL:
You can access the secret message now. P: You can access the secret message now. Please note that the message will be deleted!
Do not reload! Your entry has been delet: Do not reload! Your entry has been deleted already.
Either there is no such key or your entr: Either there is no such secret or your entry has already been accessed.
